#include <iostream>
#include <cmath>
#include <iomanip>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;cin>>t;

    while(t-->0)
    {   float hh,mm,x,y,z;
        cin>>hh>>mm;
        hh=hh*1.0;
        // cout<<hh<<" "<<mm<<endl;
        mm=mm*1.0;
        if((hh>=0&&hh<=23)&&(mm>=0&&mm<=59))
        {


        if(hh>=12.0)
        {
            hh-=12.0;
        }
        x=hh*30.0+mm*0.5;
        y=mm*6.0;
        //cout<<"X: "<<x<<endl;
        //cout<<"Y: "<<y<<endl;

        z=abs(x-y);
        if (z>180)
            {cout<<fixed;
            cout<<setprecision(1);
            cout<<(360.0-z)<<endl;}
        else
            cout<<z<<endl;

        }
        else
            cout<<"Invalid Time"<<endl;

    }





}
